SELECT A.MENU_NO , A.MENU_ORDR , A.MENU_NM , A.UPPER_MENU_NO , ( SELECT COUNT(B.MENU_NO) FROM COMTNMENUCREATDTLS B WHERE B.MENU_NO = A.MENU_NO AND B.ROLE_ID = #{roleId}) AS "chkYeoBu" FROM COMTNMENUINFO A WHERE A.MENU_NO > 0 ORDER BY A.MENU_ORDR

SELECT A.MENU_NO , A.MENU_ORDR , A.MENU_NM , A.UPPER_MENU_NO FROM COMTNMENUINFO A, COMTNMENUCREATDTLS b WHERE A.MENU_NO = b.MENU_NO AND A.MENU_NO > 0 AND UPPER_MENU_NO <> 0 AND b.ROLE_ID = #{roleId} AND b.SYSTEM_CODE = #{systemCode} ORDER BY A.MENU_NO
